attributes.action: Llynclys crossroads needs a round about or traffic lights, too many accidents
attributes.additional_details:
Drivers face long queues and take unnecessary risks to themselves and other drivers. Notable accidents just this year 24 April, 18 July, 18 August. afternoon (October 6) after a pair of crashes in just over two hours. In other years: 7 aug 2023 5 people injured. Accidents on 8, 11 and 18 march 2019. 27 oct 2013 2 people were killed after a collision with a lorry and countless others not listed
Talking isn't going to make the road safer. Helen Morgan has been campaigning for this for over 2 years
attributes.background: Find funding and take action to change this junction into a roundabout or traffic lights in the next 12 months. The crossroads named an accident black spot for several years RIS 3 spending review isn't expected to be reported until late Spring Which is too long a wait after many years of discussions

rejection.details: This is not a matter for the UK Government or for Parliament to make a decision on - and it is also a request for action at a local level.  Responsibility lies with the relevant local authority.
